headline.print_headline: Survey Finds Sharp Increase in Teen Use of HGH
headline.main: Survey Finds Sharp Increase in Teen Use of HGH

docs.lead_paragraph: Experimentation with human growth hormones by America's teens more than doubled in the past year, as more young people looked to drugs to boost their athletic performance and improve their looks, according to a new, large-scale national survey.
docs.snippet: Experimentation with human growth hormones by America's teens more than doubled in the past year, as more young people looked to drugs to boost their athletic performance and improve their looks, according to a new, large-scale national survey.
